main.name: Aleksei Beliaev
main.position: Full-stack developer (TypeScript, JavaScript, React, C#, NodeJS (no)SQL)
main.description: I work as a full-stack software developer and have a wide experience of creating and maintaining IT systems. Most of all I use C#, JavaScript, Rest API, Rabbit Mq. With C# I mean Net (.NetFramework, Net Core, EF Core, Nlog, NewtonSoft, OpenXML). JavaScript is not only a native language, but also TypeScript and the React library. I also created several simple tools with NodeJS, so JavaScript is not only for frontend.
main.bio: I work as a software developer and eager to work in NRW area - Muelheim, Essen, Duisburg, Dusseldorf
main.about:
I started to learn the development since my high school, it was the “Basic”. And then I realized that I want to be a software developer. When I was a student, I spent a lot of time to learn the development and soon I could find my first work. It was RBC (RosBusinessConsulting) – one of the best economic media in Russia. Since that time I always learn new technologies, add and improve my skills, read and listen to IT publics.
 I have been happily married for almost 20 years, we have three great children. The elder one has a big talent in mathematics and programming, he is one of the strongest schoolchildren in Moscow in these subjects. He regularly wins prizes at various competitions. My daughter is a very creative person who, in addition to school, has achieved great success in dancing, drawing, design and other creative fields. The youngest is all three and he is just a favorite of the whole family. 
 In addition to family and work, sports occupies a significant place in my life. I am fond of running (jogging) and have successfully completed several full marathons (42.2km). I also like music and gardening. I love to travel and communicate with new people, I easily find a common language with them, easily change the environment and open up to new things with pleasure.

content.name: Asp.Net, C#: MVC applications, WebForms, Console applications
content.description: The development of the small tools, the parts of microservices and the monolith applications for Net Framework and Net Core, the usage of the extensions EntityFramework, Dapper, Nlog, NewtonSoft, OpenXML and many others.

content.name: JavaScript and libraries (React and connected libraries, jQuery, NodeJS)
content.description: The front-end development with popular JS frameworks and libraries - React, Redux, Antd, Axios, Bootstrap, jQuery (mostly for old projects). I use webpack to bundle JavaScript and TypeScript applications.

content.name: XHTML, CSS, XML: deep knowledge of formats and technologies
content.description: The modern usage of CSS and SCSS for styles, use webpack to automize the CSS compilation.

content.name: Microsoft SharePoint: development webparts, timer-jobs integration with external applications
content.description: The full cycle of work with MS SharePoint (2010, 2019) - the creating a farm, the development of webparts, timerjobs and console applications for the export-import of data, integrations with external applications, Office online.

content.name: Devops engineer
content.description: Setting up the CI/CD processes with Gitlab, the automation of the creating environments with Terraform (AWS, YandexCloud) and Vagrant (VirtualBox).

content.title: Senior Software Developer
content.description: The application development for SharePoint 2019, SharePoint Online, WebAPI web services, applications for Azure and RabbitMQ, the development of the chat bot with Sematic Kernel

content.title: Senior Full-stack Software Developer
content.description: I successfully completed migration from SharePoint 2010 to SharePoint 2019 - 25k+ active users, ~1Tb content databases. I developed and implemented tools for direct data migration from SharePoint 2010 to 2019. Successfully led a small team of developers. Created a number of applications in stack of React, C# (.Net) and MS SQL for internal needs.

content.title: Full-stack SharePoint Software developer
content.description: Full support of the system based on Microsoft SharePoint. Collaborated with contractors to offer and then develop and implement different solutions. Integrated various features and technical specifications of applications, continuous functionality of the Portal system, developed SharePoint solutions for internal needs. Developed applications (Asp.net, C#, MSSQL, SharePoint) with data from several databases, AD, synchronous and asynchronous exchanges between different data sources.

content.title: Junior software developer
content.description: Development of simple applications and functions for internal needs of the company - polls, photogallery, making promo-pages. Simple SQL requests and usage in web-applications
The creating of CI/CD processes, the planning infrastructure, monitoring with Gitlab, Terraform, Docker, Prometheus, Grafana and Loki
Advanced C# development with SQL & NoSQL, REST,  SOLID, Reflection, Delegates, Async operations
SharePoint 2016 development - webparts, timer jobs, modern wepbarts
Set up SharePoint farm and make it work

content.school: Moscow Institute of Radio Equipment, Electronics and Automation
content.description: The development of radio engineering and communication environments
